com.tailf.ha

Class HaStatus

  • Object
    • com.tailf.ha.HaStatus

  • public class HaStatus
extends Object
    This class represents a status for a HA node in a HA cluster. First the state says if the node is MASTER/SLAVE/SLAVE_RELAY or NONE. If the node is Master the nodes array contains all representations of all the slave nodes in the cluster.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HaStatus(HaStateType state, ConfHaNode[] nodes) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HaStateType getHaState()
      Get the HA node state - MASTER/SLAVE/SLAVE_RELAY/NONE
      ConfHaNode[] getNodes()
      Get the array of slaves for a MASTER HA node, the MASTER node for a SLAVE HA node, or the MASTER and the "sub-slaves" for a SLAVE_RELAY HA node.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getHaState

        public HaStateType getHaState()
        Get the HA node state - MASTER/SLAVE/SLAVE_RELAY/NONE
        Returns:
        HaStateType

      • getNodes

        public ConfHaNode[] getNodes()
        Get the array of slaves for a MASTER HA node, the MASTER node for a SLAVE HA node, or the MASTER and the "sub-slaves" for a SLAVE_RELAY HA node. When SLAVE_RELAY nodes are used, the MASTER for a SLAVE or SLAVE_RELAY node is actually the immediate/parent, which may not be the actual cluster master. Returns null for NONE HA nodes.
        Returns:
        array of ConfHaNode
